data.text:
――All right, Air Shakur.
Try running the way I just laid out.
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed:
<story>――All right, Air Shakur.
<story>Try running the way I just laid out.

data.text:
The day after I met Air Shakur, when I went to check out the 
course, there she was, getting instructions from another trainer.
data.processed:
<story>The day after I met Air Shakur, when I went to check out the 
<story>course, there she was, getting instructions from another trainer.

data.text: ...Well, here goes.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Well, here goes.

data.text: ...Rrraahh!!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Rrraahh!!

data.text:
Hyaa...!? T-that scared me...!
Let's go run somewhere further away...
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>Hyaa...!? T-that scared me...!
<story>Let's go run somewhere further away...

data.text:
Air Shakur's running was wilder than I imagined. Wild, but not 
barbaric. Her form seemed incredibly refined, as if she'd 
eliminated all excess movements.
data.processed:
<story>Air Shakur's running was wilder than I imagined. Wild, but not 
<story>barbaric. Her form seemed incredibly refined, as if she'd 
<story>eliminated all excess movements.

data.text:
Haa... Ha... HA! 
HAHAHA!!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Haa... Ha... HA! 
<story>HAHAHA!!

data.text:
She attacked the straight like the last leg of a real race, steadily 
pushing forward... I was drawn in by her striking display of 
ability, but...
data.processed:
<story>She attacked the straight like the last leg of a real race, steadily 
<story>pushing forward... I was drawn in by her striking display of 
<story>ability, but...

data.text:
Whoa, whoa...! Wait a second.
That wasn't even close to what I said!
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Whoa, whoa...! Wait a second.
<story>That wasn't even close to what I said!

data.text:
My exact words were to “run like you're using a leader strategy”. 
Why'd you hang back all the way till the fourth corner?
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed:
<story>My exact words were to “run like you're using a leader strategy”. 
<story>Why'd you hang back all the way till the fourth corner?

data.text:
I'm trying to get a good picture of your strengths.
But I need you to work with me here!
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed:
<story>I'm trying to get a good picture of your strengths.
<story>But I need you to work with me here!

data.text: Half-assed.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Half-assed.

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed: <story>Huh?

data.text:
If you want to know my strengths, how's collecting data on a 
leader strat gonna help? 
Cites your sources. Break that logic down for me.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>If you want to know my strengths, how's collecting data on a 
<story>leader strat gonna help? 
<story>Cites your sources. Break that logic down for me.

data.text:
'Sides, when it comes to my own data, I've already got it all up 
here, verified and validated. I'm just gonna ignore you if you're 
gonna tell me to do all these extraneous tests.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>'Sides, when it comes to my own data, I've already got it all up 
<story>here, verified and validated. I'm just gonna ignore you if you're 
<story>gonna tell me to do all these extraneous tests.

data.text:
But your data isn't necessarily all correct, right?
As a trainer, my experience and insight are――
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed:
<story>But your data isn't necessarily all correct, right?
<story>As a trainer, my experience and insight are――

data.text: Aah, just forget it. You're just like the rest, too. No more supervised training. See ya.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Aah, just forget it. You're just like the rest, too. No more supervised training. See ya.

data.text:
Huh!? What are you talking about?
We just started!
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Huh!? What are you talking about?
<story>We just started!

data.text: No more means no more. If you really wanna waste any more of my precious time... You know what I'mma do, don't you? HUH!?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: No more means no more. If you really wanna waste any more of my precious time... You know what I'mma do, don't you? HUH!?

data.text:
Eek...! Wh-What's wrong with you? 
You're beyond understanding!
data.name: Mid-Rank Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Eek...! Wh-What's wrong with you? 
<story>You're beyond understanding!

data.text:
...Hey, you see that just now? 
How on earth are you supposed to train a girl like that?
data.name: Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>...Hey, you see that just now? 
<story>How on earth are you supposed to train a girl like that?

data.text:
No, no, there's no way...
You can't get through to someone like that――
data.name: Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>No, no, there's no way...
<story>You can't get through to someone like that――

data.text:
Hey. Shut up over there.
Y'know I can hea――
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Hey. Shut up over there.
<story>Y'know I can hea――

data.text: Uwwehhh～!?
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Uwwehhh～!?

data.text: Owww, sorry.... Sorry for causing another scene...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: <story>Owww, sorry.... Sorry for causing another scene...

data.text:
Yet another spectacular fall.
What happened this time?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Yet another spectacular fall.
<story>What happened this time?

data.text:
Ah... I... I was pushing myself too much... 
I haven't been improving my times lately... so I ran harder than I 
should've.
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>Ah... I... I was pushing myself too much... 
<story>I haven't been improving my times lately... so I ran harder than I 
<story>should've.

data.text:
...Looks like you hit a wall. 
Don't you think you oughtta take a step back and find a better 
way than just plain-old pushing yourself?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Looks like you hit a wall. 
<story>Don't you think you oughtta take a step back and find a better 
<story>way than just plain-old pushing yourself?

data.text:
I know you're working hard, but improvement won't just go on 
forever. Eventually you'll hit your limit. Gotta know when to cut 
your losses to stay efficient.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I know you're working hard, but improvement won't just go on 
<story>forever. Eventually you'll hit your limit. Gotta know when to cut 
<story>your losses to stay efficient.

data.text: Well... I'm not very smart, and slow to figure things out... Working hard is the only thing I can do.
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed: Well... I'm not very smart, and slow to figure things out... Working hard is the only thing I can do.

data.text:
If I keep trying hard, do my best and take my problem head-on... 
Even I can break through that wall, someday... Maybe... I think...
data.name: Meisho Doto
data.processed:
<story>If I keep trying hard, do my best and take my problem head-on... 
<story>Even I can break through that wall, someday... Maybe... I think...

data.text:
...That so. You breaking that wall...
I'd sure wanna see that happen.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...That so. You breaking that wall...
<story>I'd sure wanna see that happen.

data.text: ...Someday, huh.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...Someday, huh.

data.text: There's no point holding onto that hope...
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>There's no point holding onto that hope...

data.text:
Ha～... Looks like she's calmed down somehow...? 
She was worse than usual today.
data.name: Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Ha～... Looks like she's calmed down somehow...? 
<story>She was worse than usual today.

data.text:
She probably didn't think anyone else heard her say it under her 
breath―― But her whispered words kept ringing in my ear...
data.processed:
<story>She probably didn't think anyone else heard her say it under her 
<story>breath―― But her whispered words kept ringing in my ear...

data.text:
While I was thinking about the way she ran that morning, I just 
so happened to stop by the course...
data.processed:
<story>While I was thinking about the way she ran that morning, I just 
<story>so happened to stop by the course...

data.text: Haa... Haa... Ha!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Haa... Haa... Ha!

data.text: Damn it, I can't...! I can't, I can't, I can't...――
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Damn it, I can't...! I can't, I can't, I can't...――

data.text: I can't break through that “7cm”...! It's only that much! But still, I...!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: I can't break through that “7cm”...! It's only that much! But still, I...!

data.text:
Aah, that's quite unlike her.
Letting her thoughts spew out like that.
data.processed:
<story>Aah, that's quite unlike her.
<story>Letting her thoughts spew out like that.

data.text:
Good evening. My name is Agnes Tachyon. A friend of 
Shakur-kun's... Though she very much doesn't like for me to call 
myself that.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Good evening. My name is Agnes Tachyon. A friend of 
<story>Shakur-kun's... Though she very much doesn't like for me to call 
<story>myself that.

data.text:
All the telltale signs of overwork. For a pragmatic, logical person 
like her to struggle in such an illogical fashion... It's hard to truly 
empathize with what she's experiencing.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

choices.text: What exactly is she struggling with?

data.processed:
<story>All the telltale signs of overwork. For a pragmatic, logical person 
<story>like her to struggle in such an illogical fashion... It's hard to truly 
<story>empathize with what she's experiencing.

data.text:
Are you able to navigate the world of zeroes and ones? If not, it 
may very well be beyond your understanding.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Are you able to navigate the world of zeroes and ones? If not, it 
<story>may very well be beyond your understanding.

data.text:
Shakur-kun is... a devotee of data, if you will. 
One who believes collecting data and repeating simulations will 
eventually elucidate a solution.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Shakur-kun is... a devotee of data, if you will. 
<story>One who believes collecting data and repeating simulations will 
<story>eventually elucidate a solution.

data.text:
In her eyes, all the world can be divided between True or False. 
Any undefined parameters――'potential', for instance, may as 
well not exist to her.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>In her eyes, all the world can be divided between True or False. 
<story>Any undefined parameters――'potential', for instance, may as 
<story>well not exist to her.

data.text:
Ah, here's an a way to put it... Her "god" is denying her a future. 
This god has made an absolute judgement, one she cannot hope 
to overcome.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Ah, here's an a way to put it... Her "god" is denying her a future. 
<story>This god has made an absolute judgement, one she cannot hope 
<story>to overcome.

data.text:
If this god's judgement were to be overcome, its divinity would 
be called into question. A terrifying notion in and of itself. Thus 
the faithful cannot deny god's judgement, nor even curse it.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon

choices.text: Still... It looks like she's trying to change something.
choices.processed: <size=31>Still... It looks like she's trying to change something.</size>

data.processed:
<story>If this god's judgement were to be overcome, its divinity would 
<story>be called into question. A terrifying notion in and of itself. Thus 
<story>the faithful cannot deny god's judgement, nor even curse it.

data.text:
Fufu, and there's the rub. A most intruiging state of mind. 
If you asked her, she'd call such efforts foolish. And yet, she 
persists.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, and there's the rub. A most intruiging state of mind. 
<story>If you asked her, she'd call such efforts foolish. And yet, she 
<story>persists.

data.text:
The vision Shakur-kun crafted is indeed elegant in its refinement. 
But I believe true potential lies in the very extraneities she so 
deliberately excised.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>The vision Shakur-kun crafted is indeed elegant in its refinement. 
<story>But I believe true potential lies in the very extraneities she so 
<story>deliberately excised.

data.text:
Oh, it seems like she's about to wrap up training. 
You know, for all the data collection she does, she doesn't care 
much for being the one observed.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Oh, it seems like she's about to wrap up training. 
<story>You know, for all the data collection she does, she doesn't care 
<story>much for being the one observed.

data.text: So I'll be on my way now. Now then, you, the trainer oh-so curiously drawn to Shakur. What will you do?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed: So I'll be on my way now. Now then, you, the trainer oh-so curiously drawn to Shakur. What will you do?

data.text: ...I have to go get her!
data.processed: <story>...I have to go get her!
